name: part_006
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ生誕祭2026】Glitter of Love⧸誕生日記念3DLIVE【尾丸ポルカ⧸ホロライブ】 [zzVcTQOdLZE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Ending of the previous song 'Triangle Dreamer' and transition visuals.
Interlude after the song with Omaru Polka standing on stage looking at the audience.

subtitles.original: 煌々と続くショート・ショート
subtitles.english: Glittering and continuing short short

subtitles.original: 奏した絶対零度
subtitles.english: Playing with absolute zero

subtitles.original: 今夜輪廻衝 悲しみが
subtitles.english: Tonight in the cycle of rebirth, sadness...

subtitles.original: 混沌の木漏れ日歌ってるよ
subtitles.english: Is singing in the chaotic sunlight filtering through trees

subtitles.original: 運命に理由があるのならば
subtitles.english: If there is a reason for destiny

subtitles.original: 全てを懸けてみたいの
subtitles.english: I want to try staking everything

subtitles.original: あなたを守りたい
subtitles.english: I want to protect you

subtitles.english: I can become stronger and stronger, anywhere

subtitles.original: 信じて 私に出会えた奇跡
subtitles.english: Believe in the miracle of meeting me

subtitles.original: 切り拓く不死鳥の炎抱いて
subtitles.english: Paving the way, embracing the flames of the phoenix

subtitles.original: 高鳴る眼差し抱きたくなるの

subtitles.english: Flashback Flashback, shake it off

subtitles.original: 焦燥 挑み続けろ
subtitles.english: Keep challenging the impatience

subtitles.original: 飄々と佇むホット・ショット
subtitles.english: A hot shot standing coolly

subtitles.original: 私が必要でしょう
subtitles.english: You'll need me, right?

subtitles.english: Tonight in the cycle of rebirth, correctness...
